channel.title: I need help with my compiler
channel.description:
Problem: compiler!!
Server Base: pimpscape
when i compiler on my server i get this... [code]client.java:10010: cannot find symbol symbol : variable substring location : class java.lang.string String victim = commands.substring ; 'up arrow bleh' Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: recompile with -Xlint: deprecation for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . . [/code]

item.title: I need help with my compiler
item.dc:creator: @pur3str_pk2 pur3str pk2
item.description:
@pur3str_pk2 wrote:

Purpose: To have a working compiler.

Difficulty: 1/100

Assumed Knowledge: To know how to copy and paste. Need to know how your brains works.

Server Base: Testscape

Classes Modified: a .BAT file

Procedure
Step 1: if you do now have extracted it, you must do it. Go to your folder where you did save your Source. If you got still the .RAR file, right click and then click: EXTRACT HERE then you’ll go into your sources folder.

Step 2: If you’re in your sources folder (Testscape in this case) then you’ll see this file ’ ‘compile.bat’ . Right click that and remove all that things and replace that with this: @echo off title YOURSERVERNAMEHERE "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server pause replace the YOURSERVERNAMEHERE into your server name. Save it and compile and run!

Step 3: HAVE FUN

Credits: 100% me, anti leeched :o post here any problems.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help with my compiler
item.dc:creator: @littlehacker littlehacker
item.description:
@littlehacker wrote:

@echo off
color 1
title conshyscape
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe” server
pause

righ click hit edit paste this and make sure the version is right

Read full topic
